Tucson now transformed into robot mode, takes a seat next to Rodimus's beds=
ide, and prepares to sit it out for a long time, not moving from his spot. =
 If anything else he was there for support.  He had hoped by doing so, Rodi=
mus's condition may change gradually.  Yet he had time to respond to Percep=
tor and Kup as they were leaving.

" Do what you can to help Nightlight.  I=
'll stay with Rodimus to be sure he remains stable."

In his larger body fr=
ame, it was a bit hard for him to make himself comfortable yet, to him comf=
ort was the last thing on his mind.  He knew he needed Rodimus not only as =
a comrade, but as a friend.  It was the one thing that Hydras didn't have a=
nd a power he'd never experience.  The power of friendship.  

" Hopefully =
you can hear me Rodimus.  I promise you as an Autobot and a Prime, that I w=
ill NEVER give up fighting unitl the day comes when the wars finally cease.=
  After the wars, restoration is in order.  But if we're going to achieve t=
hese goals, the leaders of the Autobots and the Maximals must come together=
 as a whole and only then can we restore order on this planet.  There's jus=
t one problem, you've slipped away on us, unintentionally of course, but wi=
thout you we're not as powerful as we can be.  But with you we can give thi=
s planet what it desperately needs, new hope and the promise of new life.  =
Never give up your drive to restore order, for it's a drive that we all sha=
re and treasure and a drive that no evil force can ever bring down."

He si=
ts up trying to get in a comfortable position.

" Then there's this little =
matter of Hydras..  Unfortunately he reminds me of good old Megatron and Ga=
lvitron...  If we're going to overthrow him, we have to work together.  Tha=
t won't be easy, but I know we can do it.  If anyone should be wanting to t=
hwart him, it's you.  He did the most injustice to you, and by right, you h=
ave presidence as to how his fate should ultimately wind up.  Then, Cyclonu=
s.  I'll deal with him.  Little by little we should free this planet.  And =
little by little we can watch it flourish."
